sentences.en: Either way I shall keep the faith, carrying on until the eviction order comes.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样我都将保持自己的信念, 继续努力直到驱逐的命令传来.

sentences.en: For the other cases, files are transferred back at eviction time.
sentences.cn: 对于其它情况, 文件会在驱逐时刻被传递回去.

sentences.en: Half of those living on the Essex site - around 50 families - face eviction by the local council, Basildon.
sentences.cn: 半数住在Essex地区的人(大约50户人家)面临Basildon当地议会的驱逐令.

sentences.en: He claimed damages for unlawful eviction.
sentences.cn: 他要求对非法驱逐作出赔偿.

sentences.en: He is fighting an eviction order in court.
sentences.cn: 他正通过法庭对驱逐令表示反对.

sentences.en: He rent the eviction notice into pieces and threw it at the officer.
sentences.cn: 他把搬离通知撕得粉碎,扔到了工作人员身上.

sentences.en: He was facing eviction, along with his wife and family.
sentences.cn: 他及其妻儿正面临着被驱逐。

sentences.en: He's had nowhere to live since his eviction.
sentences.cn: 他自从被驱逐出住所以来,就一直无处栖身.

sentences.en: His landlord has begun eviction proceedings.
sentences.cn: 他的房东已经开始了驱逐程序.

sentences.en: In many areas they live under the constant threat of eviction.
sentences.cn: 在很多地区,他们都生活在随时可能被驱逐出境的持续威胁之中.

sentences.en: Kill 10 enemies while the lights are out in the subway in'Eviction'.
sentences.cn: 杀死10个敌人,而灯光是在地铁'驱逐 '.

sentences.en: Landlord George Sessler shields his face from cameras during an April eviction proceeding.
sentences.cn: 业主乔治sessler盾牌,他的脸上从相机在四月驱逐程序.

sentences.en: The family have won a temporary reprieve from eviction.
sentences.cn: 这个家庭暂时免于被逐出.

sentences.en: The remaining "New Age" travellers left Kerry just 30 minutes before the deadline set for their eviction.
sentences.cn: 就在离被驱逐的最后期限仅有30分钟时，其余的“新世纪”旅行者也离开了凯里。

sentences.en: Thomas now faces eviction from his squat.
sentences.cn: 托马斯现在要被从他占住的房子里驱赶出来。

sentences.en: We had to fork up money for our rent or face eviction.
sentences.cn: 我们得付租金了,不然会被赶出去.

trans.tran_cn: 逐出，赶出，（租地，租房等的）收回
trans.tran_en: Eviction is the act or process of officially forcing someone to leave a house or piece of land
